strategy_reasoning: Using a retro RPG 'Inventory Update' theme gamifies the feature release, making technical updates (billing, models, docs) feel like exciting loot drops. The cozy pixel art style maintains our approachable, non-corporate vibe while the carousel format encourages swiping through the heavy volume of updates.
visual_style: 16-bit SNES pixel art, Stardew Valley aesthetic, chunky sprites, visible pixel grid, lime green #ecf874 accents, soft pastel gradients.
